entry.title: IPL 3 Starts Friday and Is on Youtube
entry.content: Mark your calendar and bookmark this URL. IPL season 3 starts Friday March 12, 2010 and will be live on Youtube at http://youtube.com/ipl

entry.title: 2Coolstuff â€“ Bollywood Channel on Youtube
entry.content:
Youtube has launched exclusive bollywood channel. Right now the catalog does not have many movies, but in the near future we can expect something similar to Netflix. So stop burning CD's/copying movies from your friends just sit back and enjoy connect streamed in high resolution.

http://www.youtube.com/movies?s=mvr&b=18

entry.title: Striker Movie Now Available on Youtube
entry.content:
The new Striker Hindi movie Starring Siddarth is now availble on Youtube for Rent.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7WVcB-o-Q1I#

It costs 4.99$ dollars to rent the movie. Go ahead and watch it!

entry.title: Create Deal Search Engine Using Google Reader
entry.content:
Google Reader is great tool to read latest news and blog contents without visiting the websites. Basically its Web based RSS and Atom feed reader.

Most of the deals portals like woot.com, deals2buy.com, dealnews.com,slickdeals.net,amazon.com, etc support RSS.

To get started

1) Login into your Google Account at http://Google.com/reader (If you havent signed up yet for this service then you need to just agree to the terms of service and proceed)
2) Simply add all the deal related websites using "Add a subscription"
3) Organize all the deal related sites into an folder.

There you go - A search box is available use it to search for what ever you want.
